name: Merchandiser Status
query: SELECT CONCAT('', so_details.Sales_Order_ID, '') AS Sales_Order_Link, -- Sales Order No link MAX(so_details.Order_Date) AS Order_Date, -- Use MAX() to get the latest Order Date MAX(so_details.Delivery_Date) AS Delivery_Date, -- Use MAX() to get the latest Delivery Date so_details.Order_Status, CONCAT('', so_details.Customer_Name, '') AS Customer_Link, -- Customer Name link GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT('', i.item_name, '')) AS Item_Name, -- Concatenate item names with links MAX(i.yarn_count) AS Yarn_Count, -- Get any yarn_count in the group MAX(i.gauge) AS Gauge, -- Get any gauge in the group MAX(i.ply) AS Ply, -- Get any ply in the group MAX(i.machine_type) AS Machine_Type, -- Get any machine_type in the group MAX(i.knitting_time) AS Knitting_Time, -- Get any knitting_time in the group MAX(i.weight) AS Weight, -- Get any weight in the group SUM(soi.qty) AS Quantity_Ordered, -- Sum the ordered quantities SUM(soi.ordered_qty) AS Quantity_Delivered, -- Sum the delivered quantities SUM(soi.qty) - SUM(soi.ordered_qty) AS Pending_Quantity, -- Calculate the pending quantity MAX(soi.rate) AS Item_Rate, -- Get any rate in the group SUM(soi.qty * soi.rate) AS Total_Amount, -- Calculate total amount for the group GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT('', b_item.item_name, '')) AS Raw_Material_Name, -- Concatenate raw material names with links SUM(b_item.stock_qty) AS BOM_Required_Quantity, -- Sum the required BOM quantities SUM(soi.qty * b_item.stock_qty) AS Total_Raw_Material_Quantity_Required, -- Total raw material quantity IFNULL(SUM(bin.actual_qty), 0) AS Available_Stock, -- Sum available stock (IFNULL(SUM(bin.actual_qty), 0) - SUM(soi.qty * b_item.stock_qty)) AS Stock_Shortfall, -- Calculate stock shortfall soi.stock_uom AS UOM, MAX(mr.status) AS Raw_Material_Status, -- Get any raw material status i.item_group AS Item_Group, -- Grouping by Item Group (style) bin.warehouse AS Warehouse, -- Grouping by Warehouse (place) GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT('', b.name, '')) AS BOM_Links, -- Multiple BOM links CONCAT('', so_details.po_no, '') AS Customer_PO_Link, -- Customer's Purchase Order (PO) link COALESCE(u.full_name, so_details.owner) AS Merchandiser_Name, -- Include creator's name COALESCE(u.email, 'No Email Assigned') AS Merchandiser_Email -- Include creator's email FROM ( -- Subquery to get unique Sales Order Details SELECT so.name AS Sales_Order_ID, so.transaction_date AS Order_Date, so.delivery_date AS Delivery_Date, so.status AS Order_Status, c.customer_name AS Customer_Name, so.po_no, -- Fetch the customer's PO number here so.owner -- Include the owner field FROM `tabSales Order` so JOIN `tabCustomer` c ON so.customer = c.name WHERE so.docstatus = 1 ) AS so_details JOIN `tabSales Order Item` soi ON so_details.Sales_Order_ID = soi.parent JOIN `tabItem` i ON soi.item_code = i.item_code LEFT JOIN `tabBOM` b ON b.item = soi.item_code AND b.is_active = 1 AND b.docstatus = 1 LEFT JOIN `tabBOM Item` b_item ON b.name = b_item.parent LEFT JOIN `tabBin` bin ON b_item.item_code = bin.item_code LEFT JOIN `tabMaterial Request Item` mri ON mri.item_code = b_item.item_code LEFT JOIN `tabMaterial Request` mr ON mr.name = mri.parent LEFT JOIN `tabUser` u ON so_details.owner = u.name -- Map owner to the user table WHERE mr.docstatus = 1 -- Only valid Material Requests GROUP BY so_details.Sales_Order_ID, so_details.Order_Status, so_details.Customer_Name, i.item_group, -- Group by Item Group (style) bin.warehouse -- Group by Warehouse (place) ORDER BY so_details.Order_Date DESC;

name: Order Progress Report
query:
SELECT
    so.name AS sales_order,
    so.transaction_date AS order_date,
    so.delivery_date AS delivery_date,
    so.status AS order_status,
    c.customer_name,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT i.item_name) AS item_name,
    SUM(soi.qty) AS total_qty_ordered,
    SUM(soi.ordered_qty) AS total_qty_delivered,
    (SUM(soi.qty) - SUM(soi.ordered_qty)) AS pending_qty,
    SUM(b_item.stock_qty * soi.qty) AS raw_material_required,
    IFNULL(SUM(bin.actual_qty), 0) AS available_stock,
    (SUM(b_item.stock_qty * soi.qty) - IFNULL(SUM(bin.actual_qty), 0)) AS raw_material_shortfall,
    MAX(mr.status) AS material_request_status,
    COALESCE(u.full_name, 'Unknown') AS merchandiser_name,
    COALESCE(u.email, 'No Email Assigned') AS merchandiser_email
FROM
    `tabSales Order` so
LEFT JOIN
    `tabCustomer` c ON so.customer = c.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` soi ON so.name = soi.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON soi.item_code = i.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBOM` b ON b.item = soi.item_code AND b.is_active = 1 AND b.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBOM Item` b_item ON b.name = b_item.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBin` bin ON b_item.item_code = bin.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabMaterial Request Item` mri ON mri.item_code = b_item.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabMaterial Request` mr ON mr.name = mri.parent AND mr.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN
    `tabUser` u ON so.owner = u.name
WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY
    so.name
ORDER BY
    so.transaction_date DESC

name: Merchandiser Performance Report
query:
SELECT
    u.full_name AS "Merchandiser Name",
    COUNT(so.name) AS "Total Sales Orders",  -- Total number of orders handled by the merchandiser
    SUM(soi.qty * soi.rate) AS "Total Sales Value",  -- Total value of orders handled by the merchandiser
    SUM(soi.qty) AS "Total Quantity Ordered",  -- Total quantity ordered by the merchandiser
    SUM(soi.ordered_qty) AS "Total Quantity Delivered",  -- Total quantity delivered by the merchandiser
    (SUM(soi.qty) - SUM(soi.ordered_qty)) AS "Pending Quantity",  -- Pending quantity
    COUNT(CASE WHEN so.delivery_date <= CURDATE() THEN 1 END) AS "On Time Deliveries",  -- On-time deliveries
    COUNT(CASE WHEN so.status = 'Pending' THEN 1 END) AS "Pending Orders",  -- Pending orders
    COUNT(CASE WHEN so.status = 'Completed' THEN 1 END) AS "Completed Orders",  -- Completed orders
    COUNT(CASE WHEN so.status = 'Cancelled' THEN 1 END) AS "Cancelled Orders",  -- Cancelled orders
    COUNT(CASE WHEN mr.status = 'Submitted' THEN 1 END) AS "Raw Material Requested",  -- Raw materials requested
    SUM(b_item.stock_qty * soi.qty) AS "Total Raw Material Required",  -- Total raw material required for orders handled
    IFNULL(SUM(bin.actual_qty), 0) AS "Total Available Stock",  -- Total available stock
    (SUM(b_item.stock_qty * soi.qty) - IFNULL(SUM(bin.actual_qty), 0)) AS "Raw Material Shortfall"  -- Raw material shortfall
FROM
    `tabSales Order` so
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` soi ON so.name = soi.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON soi.item_code = i.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBOM` b ON b.item = soi.item_code AND b.is_active = 1 AND b.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBOM Item` b_item ON b.name = b_item.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabBin` bin ON b_item.item_code = bin.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabMaterial Request Item` mri ON mri.item_code = b_item.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabMaterial Request` mr ON mr.name = mri.parent AND mr.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN
    `tabUser` u ON so.owner = u.name  -- Assuming owner is the merchandiser
WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1  -- Only submitted sales orders
GROUP BY
    u.name
ORDER BY
    "Total Sales Value" DESC;  -- Sort by the total sales value for the merchandiser

name: Order Delivery Status Report
query:
SELECT
    so.name AS Sales_Order_ID,
    so.transaction_date AS Order_Date,
    so.delivery_date AS Delivery_Date,
    so.status AS Order_Status,
    c.customer_name AS Customer_Name,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT i.item_name) AS Item_Name,
    SUM(soi.qty) AS Total_Quantity_Ordered,
    SUM(COALESCE(dn_item.qty, 0)) AS Total_Quantity_Delivered,
    (SUM(soi.qty) - SUM(COALESCE(dn_item.qty, 0))) AS Pending_Quantity,  -- Correct calculation for Pending Quantity
    COALESCE(SUM(soi.qty) - SUM(COALESCE(dn_item.qty, 0)), 0) AS Pending_Quantity  -- Ensure this is not negative
FROM
    `tabSales Order` so
JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` soi ON so.name = soi.parent
JOIN
    `tabItem` i ON soi.item_code = i.item_code
LEFT JOIN
    `tabCustomer` c ON so.customer = c.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabDelivery Note Item` dn_item ON soi.item_code = dn_item.item_code AND dn_item.parenttype = 'Delivery Note'
LEFT JOIN
    `tabDelivery Note` dn ON dn.name = dn_item.parent
WHERE
    so.docstatus = 1  -- Only include submitted Sales Orders
GROUP BY
    so.name, c.customer_name
ORDER BY
    so.transaction_date DESC;

name: Material Procurement Status Report
query: SELECT so.name AS Sales_Order_ID, so.transaction_date AS Order_Date, so.delivery_date AS Delivery_Date, so.status AS Order_Status, c.customer_name AS Customer_Name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT i.item_name) AS Item_Name, SUM(soi.qty) AS Total_Quantity_Ordered, SUM(COALESCE(dn_item.qty, 0)) AS Total_Quantity_Delivered, (SUM(soi.qty) - SUM(COALESCE(dn_item.qty, 0))) AS Pending_Quantity, -- Pending quantity calculation COALESCE(SUM(soi.qty) - SUM(COALESCE(dn_item.qty, 0)), 0) AS Pending_Quantity, -- Ensure no negative values GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT('', i.item_name, '')) AS Item_Name_Links, SUM(b_item.stock_qty * soi.qty) AS Raw_Material_Required, IFNULL(SUM(bin.actual_qty), 0) AS Available_Stock, (SUM(b_item.stock_qty * soi.qty) - IFNULL(SUM(bin.actual_qty), 0)) AS Raw_Material_Shortfall, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT('', mr.name, '')) AS Material_Request_Links, COALESCE(mr.status, 'Not Requested') AS Material_Request_Status, -- Material Request Status GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT('', po.name, '')) AS Purchase_Order_Links, COALESCE(po.status, 'Not Ordered') AS Purchase_Order_Status -- Purchase Order Status FROM `tabSales Order` so JOIN `tabSales Order Item` soi ON so.name = soi.parent JOIN `tabItem` i ON soi.item_code = i.item_code LEFT JOIN `tabCustomer` c ON so.customer = c.name LEFT JOIN `tabBOM` b ON b.item = soi.item_code AND b.is_active = 1 AND b.docstatus = 1 LEFT JOIN `tabBOM Item` b_item ON b.name = b_item.parent LEFT JOIN `tabBin` bin ON b_item.item_code = bin.item_code LEFT JOIN `tabMaterial Request Item` mri ON mri.item_code = b_item.item_code LEFT JOIN `tabMaterial Request` mr ON mr.name = mri.parent AND mr.docstatus = 1 LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order Item` poi ON poi.item_code = b_item.item_code LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order` po ON po.name = poi.parent AND po.docstatus = 1 LEFT JOIN `tabDelivery Note Item` dn_item ON soi.item_code = dn_item.item_code AND dn_item.parenttype = 'Delivery Note' LEFT JOIN `tabDelivery Note` dn ON dn.name = dn_item.parent WHERE so.docstatus = 1 -- Only include submitted Sales Orders GROUP BY so.name, c.customer_name ORDER BY so.transaction_date DESC;

name: Daily Sample Requests Summary
query:
SELECT
    name AS "Request ID:Link/Daily Sample Request:120",
    requested_time AS "Requested Time:Datetime:150",
    merchandiser AS "Merchandiser:Link/Employee:150",
    designer AS "Designer:Link/Employee:150",
    buyer AS "Buyer:Link/Customer:150",
    style AS "Style:Data:150",
    gauge AS "Gauge:Data:100",
    knitting_pattern AS "Knitting Pattern:Data:150",
    sample_type AS "Sample Type:Data:120"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request`
ORDER BY requested_time DESC;

name: Buyer-wise Sample Count
query:
SELECT
    buyer AS "Buyer:Link/Customer:200",
    COUNT(name) AS "Total Requests:Int:120"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request`
GROUP BY buyer
ORDER BY COUNT(name) DESC;

name: Merchandiser Workload Report
query:
SELECT
    merchandiser AS "Merchandiser:Link/Employee:200",
    COUNT(name) AS "Requests Assigned:Int:120"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request`
GROUP BY merchandiser
ORDER BY COUNT(name) DESC;

name: Designer Load Report
query:
SELECT
    designer AS "Designer:Link/Employee:200",
    COUNT(name) AS "Total Requests:Int:120"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request`
GROUP BY designer
ORDER BY COUNT(name) DESC;

name: Sample Type Analysis
query:
SELECT
    sample_type AS "Sample Type:Data:200",
    COUNT(name) AS "Requests:Int:120"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request`
GROUP BY sample_type
ORDER BY COUNT(name) DESC;

name: Gauge & Knitting Pattern Trend
report_script:
SELECT
    gauge AS "Gauge:Data:120",
    knitting_pattern AS "Knitting Pattern:Data:200",
    COUNT(name) AS "Requests:Int:120"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request`
GROUP BY gauge, knitting_pattern
ORDER BY COUNT(name) DESC;

name: Raw Material Requirement (Child Table Join)
query:
SELECT
    dsr.name AS "Request ID:Link/Daily Sample Request:150",
    dsr.buyer AS "Buyer:Link/Customer:150",
    dsr.style AS "Style:Data:150",
    mr.item_code AS "Material:Link/Item:150",
    mr.category AS "Category:Data:120",
    mr.qty AS "Required Qty:Float:120",
    mr.uom AS "UOM:Link/UOM:80"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request` dsr
JOIN
    `tabMaterial Requirement` mr
ON
    mr.parent = dsr.name
ORDER BY dsr.requested_time DESC;

name: Sample Request Quantity Report (Child Table Join)
query:
SELECT
    dsr.name AS "Request ID:Link/Daily Sample Request:150",
    dsr.buyer AS "Buyer:Link/Customer:150",
    dsr.style AS "Style:Data:150",
    sq.size AS "Size:Data:100",
    sq.qty AS "Quantity:Int:100"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request` dsr
JOIN
    `tabSample Request Quantity` sq
ON
    sq.parent = dsr.name
ORDER BY dsr.requested_time DESC;
report_name: Sample Request Quantity Report (Child Table Join)

roles.parent: Sample Request Quantity Report (Child Table Join)

name: Comments / Feedback Tracking
query:
SELECT
    dsr.name AS "Request ID:Link/Daily Sample Request:150",
    dsr.buyer AS "Buyer:Link/Customer:150",
    dsr.style AS "Style:Data:150",
    sc.comment_by AS "Comment By:Data:150",
    sc.comment_text AS "Comment:Text:300"
FROM
    `tabDaily Sample Request` dsr
JOIN
    `tabSample Comments` sc
ON
    sc.parent = dsr.name
ORDER BY dsr.requested_time DESC;
